summary: After the sudden death of the head coach of a small Divison III football program, Athletic Director Roy Goodwyn hires ex-convict Rick Vice in a desperate attempt to get the Bluecocks' back to a winning season.
cast: Andy Dick|Marshall Cook|Michael Jace|Mo Collins|Paul Henderson|Alison Haislip|Kevin Covais|Bryan Callen|Greg Fitzsimmons|Debra Wilson|Adam Carolla|Will Sasso|Bru Muller|Tyler Sedustine|Taymour Ghazi|Ricky Horne Jr.|Sally Kirkland|Scot Ruggles|Jay Leggett|Kamala Jones|Bob Stephenson|Chris Johns|Heath Herring|Rick Dawson|Luke Eikens|Michael Adam Hamilton|Derrel Furutani|Mark Anthony Lopez|Kevin Forrest Clark|Chelsea Wullenweber|Catherine DePrima|Andrew Hunter Sherman|David Paul Windham|Joshua W. title: Division III: Football's Finest
